alert.note: Alert for Rock Island; Whiteside (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 24 at 10:44PM CDT until June 24 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Quad Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Rock Island County in northwestern Illinois... Whiteside County in northwestern Illinois... * Until 1145 PM CDT. * At 1043 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Union Grove to near Princeton, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Garden Plain, Union Grove, Fenton and Unionville around 1050 PM CDT. Morrison and Whiteside County Fairgrounds around 1055 PM CDT. Lyndon and Round Grove around 1100 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Hillsdale, Newton Corners, Erie, Emerson, Galt, Grimes Addition, Agnew, Como, Rock Falls, Spring Hill, Douglas Park, Denrock, Sterling, Prophetstown, Yeoward Addition, Whiteside County Airport, Portland Corners, Prophetstown State Recreation Area, Hamilton Corners and Leon Corners. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
